title: We could see the first full screen, notchless iPhone as soon as 2024
content:
Apple first introduced the notch back in 2017 — with the release of the iconic iPhone X. This major design change that hit the iPhone received mixed feedback from people. Some users couldn’t care less about the top notch, while others continue to demand a notchless device. To achieve a notchless iPhone, the company would

The post We could see the first full screen, notchless iPhone as soon as 2024 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A new report indicates that Apple could be releasing the first notchless iPhone as soon as 2024. Face ID would live under the display.
